programme.desc: Daphne and Roz pose as the wives of the Crane brothers to hoodwink Daphne's now-successful ex-fiance.

programme.desc: Pleasantly surprised by the woman Roz set him up with on a blind date, Frasier ends up competing with Bulldog for her attentions.

programme.desc: When Reba takes a full-time job, Jake starts calling Barbra Jean "Mommy.".

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne convinces her mother to try speed-dating after Reba has a disastrous night on the town.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba learns she will be spending Christmas Eve alone; Cheyenne and Van try to start a holiday tradition, but their plan backfires.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Everyone takes turns in front of the camera to create a video family album for Cheyenne's baby, Elizabeth.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba tries to sell her engagement ring online, Brock bids in hope of getting the ring back; Van decides it is time to buy Cheyenne a ring.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean are furious when Brock reveals he had a vasectomy; Cheyenne and Van move out of the house in protest when Reba lays down new rules following a pregnancy scare.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers with a disdain for Christmas make a holiday pact to pretend to be a couple to ease their holiday complications. As they spend more time together, the phony couple begin to experience the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: When I Think of Christmas
programme.desc: Sara reunites with her ex-boyfriend, Josh, when she returns to her hometown to help her mother move. When Sara makes a surprising discovery, she and Josh forge a bold plan for an upcoming Christmas concert that takes them back to their musical roots.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: To save her family's hotel Christmas show, a talent booker must ask for help from her ex-boyfriend -- the lead guitarist of a now-famous band that fired her as its manager years ago.

programme.title: Crashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: Maggie and Sam are crashing Christmas. When he proposes that they team up against his sister's perfect Christmas, neither of them are prepared for the blended family challenges that lie ahead.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: As maid of honor for her best friend Ava, cynical interior designer Lacey is tasked with decorating a honeymoon cottage for the newlyweds. Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: A woman makes an unexpected connection with her dance instructor after her storybook Christmas wedding is canceled.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche dreams of a visit from her deceased husband; Dorothy finds herself in a love triangle while looking to meet her ideal man.

programme.desc: Sophia becomes a sexy seductress to lure Tony into bed; Rose promises celibacy.

programme.desc: The unexpected happens when Blanche tries to break up with her disabled boyfriend.

programme.desc: Dorothy tries to mend the rift between her mother and recently widowed sister-in-law, Brenda, at a her brother's funeral.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Brock attend an out-of-town funeral; Barbra Jean worries about her husband and his ex-wife being alone together; Reba sings.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brian asks Reba out for Valentine's day but she is nervous and pretends to be sick; Jake likes a girl at school.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is pressured to take sides in a legal battle between her boss and Brock.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: A Merry Scottish Christmas
programme.desc: When estranged siblings Lindsay and Brad Morgan travel to Scotland at Christmas to reunite with their mother Jo, a big family secret is revealed.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.
